name: The Labyrinth of Kur
description:
Story

When a mage commits a crime in Kur, they are sent to the Labyrinth. A place built by the gods, it holds great secrets, yet no one is willing to risk their lives for them. Yet you have no choice.

You battle the undead, monsters, demons and living weapons in your quest to escape the Labyrinth and restore your life.

Features
  • 5 Playable characters.
  • 3 different bosses.
  • endless dungeon generation.
  • 6 unique spells.
  • deep lore and story.
  • ending for each character.
  • 12+ maps.
Gameplay
  • Walk => W-A-S-D.
  • Shoot => Left-Mouse.
  • Dash => Right-Mouse.
  • Interact => F.
  • Drink Health Potion => E
  • Drink Mana Potion => Q
  • Change Spell => Scroll-Up/Down.
Details
  • 1920x1080 Window Size.
  • Pixel Art.
  • Full Screen Support (F11)
  • Linux / Windows / MacOS
